name: Red Ticking Bundle, Set of 8
description:
This red ticking makes fantastic napkins. A nice medium weight, these napkins can be added to a holiday table or be used year round. They go with everything! 

Using cloth napkins at every meal, or even just at dinner, reduces waste, after the initial investment, saves you money. 

set of 4
18‚Äù napkins finished with a rolled edge
100% cotton
Machine Wash and dry. (Or hang dry to save energy!)


Thanks for looking! Have questions or would like to place a special order, just ask!

name: White Seersucker with Contrast Edging, Set of 4
description:
I love the contrast of the edging with the crisp, white seersucker cloth napkin! This is a set of four cloth napkins in the 18inch size. You choose the color for the edging:

red
orange
dark pink
light pink
OR
one of each

If you are interested in a different color or size,  or would like to order in bulk, send me a message and I will give you a quote.
Thanks!

name: Pastel Mix for Weddings, Events
description:
Let us help you out with beautiful napkins made from a variety of fabrics. You tell us the quantity and size, as well as your color theme and print preferences (stripes, florals, gingham check, a mix of all, etc.), and we will send you photos of the range of fabrics that we have. (Fabrics pictured are an example of an order in grays and orange.)

We can create sets of napkins for showers, birthday parties, dinner parties, special holidays, weddings, or simply for you and your everyday meals. Custom sets can be 4 napkins to 250+ napkins, in any size.

Prices start at $2.25- $4.50, depending on the quantity and the size. Just send me a note for specifics. 

The listing price is per napkin in the 18inch size. If you are interested in a large order, ask me for our bulk rates.

20inch- special meals
18inch- everyday dining (default set)
14inch- luncheon
12inch- lunchboxes, cocktails, appetizers
10inch- lunchboxes, cocktails, appetizers

name: College Football Cloth Napkins- Orange with Blue Edging
description:
Perfect for tailgating or hosting a college game party at home! These soft seersucker napkins are edged in a contrasting color to match your favorite college team. This listing is for the University of Florida, made from orange seersucker and edged in a vibrant blue. The price is per napkin, allowing you to order as many as you need, and in any size: 20inch, 18inch, 14inch, 12inch, or 10inch. 

Napkins shipped out in 5-7 business days. 

Want a different color combo? I have all colors of seersucker and thread available. 

Need a large order? Just ask me about our bulk pricing.

Thanks so much!

name: Refundable Deposit for Rentals of Cloth Napkins
description:
This listing is for the refundable deposit for the rental service of our cloth napkins. Please purchase this alongside the rental service in the exact quantity of the service. 

For example, if you need 100 cloth napkins, purchase the service listing in a quantity of 100 and this listing in the quantity of 100. This listing is 100% refundable once the napkins are shipped back, unwashed. Napkins are to be shipped back with 48 hours after your event. 

If you have any questions, please feel free to ask questions.
Thanks!!

name: Rental Cloth Napkins, Wedding Cloth Napkins, Special Events
description:
Cloth napkins can make a table setting and the meal feel special and unique. Rather than using the white or black polyester cloth napkins that the caterer provides, use our napkins. We customize our cloth napkins to suit your event. With the details you provide, such as color/colors, print preference (florals, dot, seersucker, check, geometric, etc) and the overall look of your event, we create a set of napkins that is customized for you. 

Our rental napkins come in the 18inch size and are made from vintage and new fabrics, all in 100% cotton. They are shipped to you pressed and ready to add a pop of color and richness to your table. 

This is for the rental service of our cloth napkins. You will also need to purchase the listing for the refundable deposit in the same quantity as the rental service. 

Our rental napkins are shipped to you free of charge, one to two weeks prior to our event, and are to be shipped back (you are responsible for return shipping) 48 hours after your event, unwashed. 

Please feel free to ask any questions. Thanks!

name: Custom Wedding Cloth Napkins
description:
Are you needing a custom set of napkins for your wedding or special event? 

I specialize in creating custom sets in any any quantity (6-500) and size (6inch to 22inch). Let me know your colors and look, as well as how many napkins needed, and I will create a collage of fabric choices for you. Once you have picked out the fabrics, I set up a listing just for you for your custom set. Prices vary depending on quantity and size of napkin.

Please feel free to ask any questions. Thanks!!

name: Custom Set, You Choose Fabrics and Quantity
description:
Are you needing a custom set of napkins for your wedding or special event? Or simply want a large set to begin going paper-less? 

I specialize in creating custom sets in any any quantity (6-500) and size (6inch to 22inch). Let me know your colors and look, as well as how many napkins needed, and I will create a collage of fabric choices for you. Once you have picked out the fabrics, I set up a listing just for you for your custom set. Prices vary depending on quantity and size of napkin.

Please feel free to ask any questions. Thanks!!
